remarks: Any two distinct points in a T_1 space are separated by an open set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
statement:
t1sep.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
t1sep $p |- ( ( J e. Fre /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ A =/= B ) ) -> E. o e. J ( A e. o /\ -. B e. o ) ) $.
$d A o $.
$d B o $.
$d J o $.
$d X o $.
